translations: v.陷于泥淖；陷入困境（bog 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Cranberry bogs consume lots of space in the marshland.
sentences.translation: 蔓越莓沼泽湿地占据了大量沼泽的空间。

sentences.sentence: Agricultural run-off and pollution from power plants are adding extra nitrogen to many bogs in North America.
sentences.translation: 农业排水和来自发电厂的污染给北美的许多沼泽增加了额外的氮。

sentences.sentence: Bogs are also flooded with sunshine, so even an inefficient carnivorous plant can photosynthesise enough light to survive.
sentences.translation: 沼泽也充满阳光，所以即使是低效的食肉植物也能获得足够的光，依靠光合作用生存。
